SYSTEM: ODESeW-Everis.pdf: Página 8
Ontological Engineering Group. 
ecReport
A web application supported by 6 ontologies:
•
Documentation Ontology
•
Organization Ontology
•
Person Ontology
•
Project Ontology
•
Event Ontology
•
Project Management Ontology
A collaborative tool for editing the periodic reports
•
Workpackage Progress Report
•
Effort Report
•
Dissemination Report
•
E-Mail notification on starting periods or for delays
•
Monitorization of the Reporting Period
•
Compilation of partial reports into a complete report in MSWord 
format.
speaker: SYSTEM
